original: adyāpi tāṃ kanakacampakadāmagaurīṃ phullāravindavadanāṃ tanuromarājīm /
analyzed: adyā api tām kanaka campaka dāma gaurīm phulla aravinda vadanām tanu romarājīm

original: suptotthitāṃ madanavihvalalālasāṅgīṃ vidyāṃ pramādaguṇitām iva cintayāmi // BiCaup_1 //
analyzed: supta utthitām madana vihvala lālasa aṅgīm vidyām pramāda guṇitām iva cintayāmi

original: adyāpi tāṃ śaśimukhīṃ navayauvanāḍhyāṃ pīnastanīṃ punar ahaṃ yadi gaurakāntim /
analyzed: adyā api tām śaśi mukhīm nava yauvana āḍhyām pīna stanīm punar aham yadi gaura kāntim

original: paśyāmi manmathaśarānalapīḍitāṅgīṃ gātrāṇi saṃprati karomi suśītalāni // BiCaup_2 //
analyzed: paśyāmi manmatha śara anala pīḍita aṅgīm gātrāṇi saṃprati karomi su śītalāni

original: adyāpi tāṃ yadi punaḥ kamalāyatākṣīṃ paśyāmi pīvarapayodharabhārakhinnām /
analyzed: adyā api tām yadi punar kamala āyata akṣīm paśyāmi pīvara payodhara bhāra khinnām

original: saṃpīḍya bāḥuyugalena pibāmi vaktram unmattavan madhukaraḥ kamalaṃ yatheṣṭam // BiCaup_3 //
analyzed: saṃpīḍya bāḥu yugalena pibāmi vaktram unmatta vat madhukaraḥ kamalam yathā iṣṭam

original: adyāpi tāṃ nidhuvanaklamaniḥsahāṅgīm āpāṇḍugaṇḍapatitālakakuntalālim /
analyzed: adyā api tām nidhuvana klama niḥsaha aṅgīm āpāṇḍu gaṇḍapati tālaka kuntala alim

original: pracchannapāpakṛtamantharam āvahantīṃ kaṇṭhāvasaktabāhulatāṃ smarāmi // BiCaup_4 //
analyzed: pracchanna pāpa kṛta mantharam āvahantīm kaṇṭha avasakta bāhu latām smarāmi

original: adyāpi tāṃ suratajāgaraghūrṇamāna tiryagvalattaralatārakam āyatākṣīm /
analyzed: adyā api tām surata jāgara ghūrṇamāna tiryak valat tarala tārakam āyata akṣīm

original: śṛṅgārasārakamalākararājahaṃsīṃ vrīḍāvinamravadanām uṣasi smarāmi // BiCaup_5 //
analyzed: śṛṅgāra sāra kamala ākara rājahaṃsīm vrīḍā vinamra vadanām uṣasi smarāmi

original: adyāpi tāṃ yadi punaḥ śravaṇāyatākṣīṃ paśyāmi dīrghavirahajvaritāṅgayaṣṭim /
analyzed: adyā api tām yadi punar śravaṇa āyata akṣīm paśyāmi dīrgha viraha jvarita aṅga yaṣṭim

original: aṅgair ahaṃ samupaguhya tato 'tigāḍhaṃ nonmīlayāmi nayane na ca tāṃ tyajāmi // BiCaup_6 //
analyzed: aṅgaiḥ aham samupaguhya tatas ati gāḍham nā unmīlayāmi nayane na ca tām tyajāmi

original: adyāpi tāṃ suratatāṇḍavasūtradhārīṃ pūrṇendusundaramukhīṃ madavihvalāṅgīm /
analyzed: adyā api tām surata tāṇḍava sūtradhārīm pūrṇa indu sundara mukhīm mada vihvala aṅgīm

original: tanvīṃ viśālajaghanastanabhāranamrāṃ vyālolakuntalakalāpavatīṃ smarāmi // BiCaup_7 //
analyzed: tanvīm viśāla jaghana stana bhāra namrām vyālola kuntala kalāpavatīm smarāmi

original: adyāpi tāṃ masṛṇacandanapaṅkamiśra- kastūrikāparimalotthavisarpigandhām /
analyzed: adyā api tām masṛṇa candana paṅka miśra kastūrikā parimala uttha visarpi gandhām

original: anyonyacañcupuṭacumbanalagnapakṣma yugmābhirāmanayanāṃ śayane smarāmi // BiCaup_8 //
analyzed: anyonya cañcu puṭa cumbana lagna pakṣma yugma abhirāma nayanām śayane smarāmi

original: adyāpi tāṃ nidhuvane madhupānaraktām līlādharāṃ kṛśatanuṃ capalāyatākṣīm /
analyzed: adyā api tām nidhuvane madhu pāna raktām līlā dharām kṛśa tanum capala āyata akṣīm

original: kāśmīrapaṅkamṛganābhikṛtāṅgarāgāṃ karpūrapūgaparipūrṇamukhīṃ smarāmi // BiCaup_9 //
analyzed: kāśmīra paṅka mṛganābhi kṛta aṅgarāgām karpūra pūga paripūrṇa mukhīm smarāmi

original: adyāpi tat kanakagaurakṛtāṅgarāgaṃ prasvedabinduvitataṃ vadanaṃ priyāyāḥ /
analyzed: adyā api tat kanakagaura kṛta aṅgarāgam prasveda bindu vitatam vadanam priyāyāḥ

original: ante smarāmi ratikhedavilolanetraṃ rāhūparāgaparimuktam ivendubimbam // BiCaup_10 //
analyzed: ante smarāmi rati kheda vilola netram rāhu uparāga parimuktam iva indu bimbam

original: adyāpi tanmanasi saṃparivartate me rātrau mayi kṣutavati kṣitipālaputryā /
analyzed: adyā api tat manasi saṃparivartate me rātrau mayi kṣutavati kṣitipāla putryā

original: jīveti maṅgalavacaḥ parihṛtya kopāt karṇe kṛtaṃ kanakapatram anālapantyā // BiCaup_11 //
analyzed: jīva iti maṅgala vacaḥ parihṛtya kopāt karṇe kṛtam kanaka patram an ālapantyā

original: adyāpi tat kanakakuṇḍalaghṛṣṭagaṇḍam āsyaṃ smarāmi viparītaratābhiyoge /
analyzed: adyā api tat kanaka kuṇḍala ghṛṣṭa gaṇḍam āsyam smarāmi viparīta rata abhiyoge

original: āndolanaśramajalasphuṭasāndrabindu muktāphalaprakaravicchuritaṃ priyāyāḥ // BiCaup_12 //
analyzed: āndolana śramajala sphuṭa sāndra bindu muktāphala prakara vicchuritam priyāyāḥ

original: adyāpi tatpraṇayabhaṅgagurudṛṣṭipātaṃ tasyāḥ smarāmi rativibhramagātrabhaṅgam /
analyzed: adyā api tad praṇaya bhaṅga guru dṛṣṭi pātam tasyāḥ smarāmi rati vibhrama gātra bhaṅgam

original: vastrāñcalaskhalatacārupayodharāntaṃ dantacchadaṃ daśanakhaṇḍanamaṇḍanaṃ ca // BiCaup_13 //
analyzed: vastra añcala skhalat acāru payodhara antam dantacchadam daśana khaṇḍana maṇḍanam ca

original: adyāpy aśokanavapallavaraktahastāṃ muktāphalapracayacumbitacūcukāgrām /
analyzed: adyā api aśoka nava pallava rakta hastām muktāphala pracaya cumbita cūcuka agrām

original: antaḥ smitocchvasitapāṇḍuragaṇḍabhittiṃ tāṃ vallabhāmalasahaṃsagatiṃ smarāmi // BiCaup_14 //
analyzed: antar smita ucchvasita pāṇḍura gaṇḍa bhittim tām vallabhām alasa haṃsa gatim smarāmi

original: adyāpi tat kanakareṇughanorudeśe nyastaṃ smarāmi nakharakṣatalakṣma tasyāḥ /
analyzed: adyā api tat kanaka reṇu ghana ūru deśe nyastam smarāmi nakhara kṣata lakṣma tasyāḥ

original: ākṛṣṭahemarucirāmbaram utthitāyā lajjāvaśāt karaghṛtaṃ ca tato vrajantyāḥ // BiCaup_15 //
analyzed: ākṛṣṭa hema rucira ambaram utthitāyāḥ lajjā vaśāt kara ghṛtam ca tatas vrajantyāḥ

original: adyāpi tāṃ vidhṛtakajjalalolanetrāṃ pṛthvīṃ prabhūtakusumākulakeśapāśām /
analyzed: adyā api tām vidhṛta kajjala lola netrām pṛthvīm prabhūta kusuma ākula keśapāśām

original: sindūrasaṃlulitamauktikadantakāntim ābaddhahemakaṭakāṃ rahasi smarāmi // BiCaup_16 //
analyzed: sindūra saṃlulita mauktika danta kāntim ābaddha hema kaṭakām rahasi smarāmi

original: adyāpi tāṃ galitabandhanakeśapāśāṃ srastasrajaṃ smitasudhāmadhurādharauṣṭhīm /
analyzed: adyā api tām galita bandhana keśapāśām srasta srajam smita sudhā madhura adhara oṣṭhīm

original: pīnonnatastanayugoparicārucumban muktāvalīṃ rahasi loladṛśam smarāmi // BiCaup_17 //
analyzed: pīna unnata stana yuga upari cāru cumban muktā āvalīm rahasi lola dṛśam smarāmi

original: adyāpi tāṃ dhavalaveśmani ratnadīpa mālāmayūkhapaṭalair dalitāndhakāre /
analyzed: adyā api tām dhavala veśmani ratnadīpa mālā mayūkha paṭalaiḥ dalita andhakāre

original: prāptodyame rahasi saṃmukhadarśanārthaṃ lajjābhayārthanayanām anucintayāmi // BiCaup_18 //
analyzed: prāpta udyame rahasi saṃmukha darśana artham lajjā bhaya artha nayanām anucintayāmi

original: adyāpi tāṃ virahavahninipīḍitāṅgīṃ tanvīṃ kuraṅganayanāṃ surataikapātrīm /
analyzed: adyā api tām viraha vahni nipīḍita aṅgīm tanvīm kuraṅga nayanām surata eka pātrīm

original: nānāvicitrakṛtamaṇḍanam āvahantīṃ tāṃ rājahaṃsagamanāṃ sudatīṃ smarāmi // BiCaup_19 //
analyzed: nānā vicitra kṛta maṇḍanam āvahantīm tām rājahaṃsa gamanām sudatīm smarāmi

original: adyāpi tāṃ vihasitāṃ kucabhāranamrāṃ muktākalāpadhavalīkṛtakaṇṭhadeśām /
analyzed: adyā api tām vihasitām kuca bhāra namrām muktā kalāpa dhavalīkṛta kaṇṭha deśām

original: tat kelimandaragirau kusumāyudhasya kāntāṃ smarāmi rucirojjvalapuṣpaketum // BiCaup_20 //
analyzed: tat keli mandara girau kusumāyudhasya kāntām smarāmi rucira ujjvala puṣpaketum

original: adyāpi tāṃ cāṭuśatadurlalitocitārthaṃ tasyāḥ smarāmi surataklamavihvalāyāḥ /
analyzed: adyā api tām cāṭu śata durlalita ucita artham tasyāḥ smarāmi surata klama vihvalāyāḥ

original: avyaktaniḥsvanitakātarakathyamāna saṃkīrṇavarṇaruciraṃ vacanaṃ priyāyāḥ // BiCaup_21 //
analyzed: avyakta niḥsvanita kātara kathyamāna saṃkīrṇa varṇa ruciram vacanam priyāyāḥ

original: adyāpi tāṃ surataghūrṇanimīlitākṣīṃ srastāṅgayaṣṭigalitāṃśukakeśapāśām /
analyzed: adyā api tām surata ghūrṇa nimīlita akṣīm srasta aṅga yaṣṭi galita aṃśuka keśapāśām

original: śṛṅgāravāriruhakānanarājahaṃsīṃ janmāntare 'pi nidhane 'py anucintayāmi // BiCaup_22 //
analyzed: śṛṅgāra vāriruha kānana rājahaṃsīm janmāntare api nidhane api anucintayāmi

original: adyāpi tāṃ praṇayinīṃ mṛgaśāvakākṣīṃ pīyūṣapurṇakucakumbhayugaṃ vahantīm /
analyzed: adyā api tām praṇayinīm mṛga śāvaka akṣīm pīyūṣa purṇa kuca kumbha yugam vahantīm

original: paśyāmy ahaṃ yadi punar divasāvasāne svargāpavarganararājasukhaṃ tyajāmi // BiCaup_23 //
analyzed: paśyāmi aham yadi punar divasa avasāne svarga apavarga nara rāja sukham tyajāmi

original: adyāpi tāṃ kṣititale varakāminīnāṃ sarvāṅgasundaratayā prathamaikarekhām /
analyzed: adyā api tām kṣiti tale vara kāminīnām sarva aṅga sundara tayā prathama eka rekhām

original: śṛṅgāranāṭakarasottamapānapātrīṃ kāntāṃ smarāmi kusumāyudhabāṇakhinnām // BiCaup_24 //
analyzed: śṛṅgāra nāṭaka rasa uttama pāna pātrīm kāntām smarāmi kusumāyudha bāṇa khinnām

original: adyāpi tāṃ stimitavastram ivāṅgalagnāṃ prauḍhapratāpamadanānalataptadeham /
analyzed: adyā api tām stimita vastram iva aṅga lagnām prauḍha pratāpa madana anala tapta deham

original: bālām anāthaśaraṇām anukampanīyāṃ prāṇādhikāṃ kṣaṇam ahaṃ na hi vismarāmi // BiCaup_25 //
analyzed: bālām anātha śaraṇām anukampanīyām prāṇa adhikām kṣaṇam aham na hi vismarāmi

original: adyāpi tāṃ prathamato varasundarīṇāṃ snehaikapātraghaṭitām avanīśaputrīm /
analyzed: adyā api tām prathamatas vara sundarīṇām sneha eka pātra ghaṭitām avanīśa putrīm

original: haṃhojanā mama viyogahutāśano 'yaṃ soḍhuṃ na śakyateti praticintayāmi // BiCaup_26 //
analyzed: haṃho janāḥ mama viyoga hutāśanaḥ ayam soḍhum na śakyate iti praticintayāmi

original: adyāpi vismayakarīṃ tridaśān vihāya buddhir balāc calati me kim ahaṃ karomi /
analyzed: adyā api vismaya karīm tridaśān vihāya buddhiḥ balāt calati me kim aham karomi

original: jānann api pratimuhūrtam ihāntakāle kānteti vallabhatareti mameti dhīrā // BiCaup_27 //
analyzed: jānan api pratimuhūrtam iha antakāle kāntā iti vallabhatarā iti mama iti dhīrā

original: adyāpi tāṃ gamanam ity uditaṃ madīyaṃ śrutvaiva bhīruhariṇīm iva cañcalākṣīm /
analyzed: adyā api tām gamanam iti uditam madīyam śrutvā eva bhīru hariṇīm iva cañcala akṣīm

original: vācaḥ skhaladvigaladāśrujalākulākṣīṃ saṃcintayāmi guruśokavinamravaktrām // BiCaup_28 //
analyzed: vācaḥ saṃcintayāmi guru śoka vinamra vaktrām

original: adyāpi tāṃ sunipuṇaṃ yatatā mayāpi dṛṣṭaṃ na yat sadṛśatovadanaṃ kadācit /
analyzed: adyā api tām su nipuṇam yatatā mayā api dṛṣṭam na yat sadṛśataḥ vadanam kadācid

original: saundaryanirjitarati dvijarājakānti kāntām ihātivimalatvamahāguṇena // BiCaup_29 //
analyzed: saundarya nirjita rati dvijarāja kānti kāntām iha ati vimala tva mahā guṇena

original: adyāpi tāṃ kṣaṇaviyogaviṣopameyāṃ saṅge punar bahutarām amṛtābhiṣekām /
analyzed: adyā api tām kṣaṇa viyoga viṣa upameyām saṅge punar bahutarām amṛta abhiṣekām

original: tāṃ jīvadhāraṇakarīṃ madanātapatrām udvattakeśanivahāṃ sudatīṃ smarāmi // BiCaup_30 //
analyzed: tām jīva dhāraṇa karīm madana ātapatrām udvatta keśa nivahām sudatīm smarāmi

original: adyāpi vāsagṛhato mayi nīyamane durvārabhīṣaṇakarair yamadūtakalpair /
analyzed: adyā api vāsagṛhataḥ mayi nīya mane durvāra bhīṣaṇa karaiḥ yama dūta kalpaiḥ

original: kiṃ kiṃ tayā bahuvidhaṃ na kṛtaṃ madarthe vaktuṃ na pāryateti vyathate mano me // BiCaup_31 //
analyzed: kim kim tayā bahuvidham na kṛtam mad arthe vaktum na vyathate manaḥ me

original: adyāpi me niśi divā hṛdayaṃ dunoti pūrṇendusundaramukhaṃ mama vallabhāyāḥ /
analyzed: adyā api me niśi divā hṛdayam dunoti pūrṇa indu sundara mukham mama vallabhāyāḥ

original: lāvaṇyanirjitaratikṣatikāmadarpaṃ bhūyaḥ puraḥ pratipadaṃ na vilokyate yat // BiCaup_32 //
analyzed: lāvaṇya nirjita rati kṣati kāma darpam bhūyas puras pratipadam na vilokyate yat

original: adyāpi tām avahitāṃ manasācalena saṃcintayāmi yuvatīṃ mama jīvitāśām /
analyzed: adyā api tām avahitām manasā acalena saṃcintayāmi yuvatīm mama jīvita āśām

original: nānyopabhuktanavayauvanabhārasārāṃ janmāntare 'pi mama saiva gatir yathā syāt // BiCaup_33 //
analyzed: na anya upabhukta nava yauvana bhāra sārām janmāntare api mama sā eva gatiḥ yathā syāt

original: adyāpi tadvadanapaṅkajagandhalubdha bhrāmyaddvirephacayacumbitagaṇḍadeśām /
analyzed: adyā api tad vadana paṅkaja gandha lubdha bhrāmyat dvirepha caya cumbita gaṇḍa deśām

original: līlāvadhūtakarapallavakaṅkaṇānāṃ kvāṇo vimūrcchati manaḥ sutarāṃ madīyam // BiCaup_34 //
analyzed: līlā avadhūta karapallava kaṅkaṇānām kvāṇaḥ vimūrcchati manaḥ sutarām madīyam

original: adyāpi tāṃ nakhapadaṃ stanamaṇḍale yad dattaṃ mayāsyamadhupānavimohitena /
analyzed: adyā api tām nakha padam stana maṇḍale yat dattam mayā āsya madhu pāna vimohitena

original: udbhinnaromapulakair bahubhiḥ samantāj jāgarti rakṣati vilokayati smarāmi // BiCaup_35 //
analyzed: udbhinna roma pulakaiḥ bahubhiḥ samantāt jāgarti rakṣati vilokayati smarāmi

original: adyāpi kopavimukhīkṛtagantukāmā noktaṃ vacaḥ pratidadāti yadaiva vaktram /
analyzed: adyā api kopa vimukhīkṛta gantu kāmā nā uktam vacaḥ pratidadāti yadā eva vaktram

original: cumbāmi roditi bhṛśaṃ patito 'smi pāde dāsas tava priyatame bhaja maṃ smarāmi // BiCaup_36 //
analyzed: cumbāmi roditi bhṛśam patitaḥ asmi pāde dāsaḥ tava priyatame bhaja smarāmi

original: adyāpi dhavati manaḥ kim ahaṃ karomi sārdhaṃ sakhībhir api vāsagṛhaṃ sukānte /
analyzed: adyā api dhavati manaḥ kim aham karomi sārdham sakhībhiḥ api vāsagṛham su kānte

original: kāntāṅgasaṃgaparihāsavicitranṛtye krīḍābhirāmeti yātu madīyakālaḥ // BiCaup_37 //
analyzed: kānta aṅga saṃga parihāsa vicitra nṛtye krīḍā abhirāmā iti yātu madīya kālaḥ

original: adyāpi tāṃ jagati varṇayituṃ na kaś cic chaknoty adṛṣṭasadṛśīṃ ca parigrahaṃ me /
analyzed: adyā api tām jagati varṇayitum na kaḥ cit śaknoti adṛṣṭa sadṛśīm ca parigraham me

original: dṛṣṭaṃ tayor sadṛśayor khalu yena rūpaṃ śakto bhaved yadi saiva naro na cānyaḥ // BiCaup_38 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭam tayoḥ sadṛśayoḥ khalu yena rūpam śaktaḥ bhavet yadi sā eva naraḥ na ca anyaḥ

original: adyāpi tāṃ na khalu vedmi kim īśapatnī śāpaṃ gatā surapater atha kṛṣṇalakṣmī /
analyzed: adyā api tām na khalu vedmi kim īśa patnī śāpam gatā surapateḥ atha kṛṣṇa lakṣmī

original: dhātraiva kiṃ nu jagataḥ parimohanāya sā nirmitā yuvatiratnadidṛkṣayā vā // BiCaup_39 //
analyzed: dhātrā eva kim nu jagataḥ parimohanāya sā nirmitā yuvati ratna didṛkṣayā vā

original: adyāpi tannayanakajjalam ujjvalāsyaṃ viśrāntakarṇayugalaṃ parihāsahetor /
analyzed: adyā api tad nayana kajjalam ujjvala āsyam viśrānta karṇa yugalam parihāsa hetoḥ

original: paśye tavātmani navīnapayodharābhyāṃ kṣīṇāṃ vapur yadi vinaśyati no na doṣaḥ // BiCaup_40 //
analyzed: paśye tava ātmani navīna payodharābhyām kṣīṇām vapuḥ yadi vinaśyati naḥ na doṣaḥ

original: adyāpi nirmalaśaracchaśigaurakānti ceto muner api haret kim utāsmadīyam /
analyzed: adyā api nirmala śarad śaśi gaura kānti cetaḥ muneḥ api haret kim uta asmadīyam

original: vaktraṃ sudhāmayam ahaṃ yadi tat prapadye cumban pibāmy avirataṃ vyadhate mano me // BiCaup_41 //
analyzed: vaktram sudhā mayam aham yadi tat prapadye cumban pibāmi aviratam manaḥ me

original: adyāpi tat kamalareṇusugandhagandhi tatpremavāri makaradhvajapātakāri /
analyzed: adyā api tat kamala reṇu sugandha gandhi tat prema vāri makaradhvaja pāta kāri

original: prāpnomy ahaṃ yadi punaḥ surataikatīrthaṃ prāṇāṃs tyajāmī niyataṃ tadavāptihetor // BiCaup_42 //
analyzed: prāpnomi aham yadi punar surata eka tīrtham prāṇān tyajāmi ī niyatam tad avāpti hetoḥ

original: adyāpy aho jagati sundaralakṣapūrṇe 'nyānyam uttamaguṇādhikasaṃprapanne /
analyzed: adyā api aho jagati sundara lakṣa pūrṇe anya anyam uttama guṇa adhika saṃprapanne

original: anyābhir apy upamituṃ na mayā ca śakyaṃ rūpaṃ tadīyam iti me hṛdaye vitarkaḥ // BiCaup_43 //
analyzed: anyābhiḥ api upamitum na mayā ca śakyam rūpam tadīyam iti me hṛdaye vitarkaḥ

original: adyāpi sā mama manastaṭinī sadāste romāñcavīcivilasadvipulasvabhāvā% /
analyzed: adyā api sā mama manaḥ taṭinī sadā āste romāñca vīci vilasat vipula svabhāvā

original: kādambakeśararuciḥ kṣatavīkṣaṇaṃ māṃ gātraklamaṃ kathayatī priyarājahaṃsī // BiCaup_44 //
analyzed: kādamba kesara ruciḥ kṣata vīkṣaṇam mām gātra klamam kathayatī priya rājahaṃsī

original: adyāpi sā hi navayauvanasundarāṅgī romāñcavīcivilasaccapalāṅgayaṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: adyā api sā hi nava yauvana sundara aṅgī romāñca vīci vilasat capala aṅgayaṣṭiḥ

original: matsvāntasārasacaladvirahoccapaṃkāt kiṃcidgamaṃ prathayati priyarājahaṃsī // BiCaup_44* //
analyzed: mad svānta sārasa calat viraha ucca paṃkāt kiṃcid gamam prathayati priya rājahaṃsī

original: adyāpi tāṃ nṛpatī śekhararājaputrīṃ saṃpūrṇayauvanamadālasaghūrṇanetrīm /
analyzed: adyā api tām nṛpatī śekhara rāja putrīm saṃpūrṇa yauvana mada alasa ghūrṇa netrīm

original: gandharvayakṣasurakiṃnaranāgakanyāṃ svargād aho nipatitām iva cintayāmi // BiCaup_45 //
analyzed: gandharva yakṣa sura kiṃnara nāga kanyām svargāt aho nipatitām iva cintayāmi

original: adyāpi tāṃ nijavapuḥ kṛśavedimadhyām uttuṃgasaṃbhṛtasudhāstanakumbhayugmām /
analyzed: adyā api tām nija vapuḥ kṛśa vedi madhyām uttuṃga saṃbhṛta sudhā stana kumbha yugmām

original: nānāvicitrakṛtamaṇḍamaṇḍitāṅgī suptotthitāṃ niśi divā na hi vismarāmi // BiCaup_46 //
analyzed: nānā vicitra kṛta maṇḍa maṇḍita aṅgī supta utthitām niśi divā na hi vismarāmi

original: adyāpi tāṃ kanakakāntimadālasāṅgīṃ vrīḍotsukāṃ nipatitām iva ceṣṭamānām /
analyzed: adyā api tām kanaka kānti mada alasa aṅgīm vrīḍā utsukām nipatitām iva ceṣṭamānām

original: agāṃgasaṃgaparicumbanajātamohāṃ tāṃ jīvanauṣadhim iva pramadāṃ smarāmi // BiCaup_47 //
analyzed: tām jīvana oṣadhim iva pramadām smarāmi

original: adyāpi tatsuratakelinirastrayuddhaṃ bandhopabandhapatanotthitaśūnyahastam /
analyzed: adyā api tad surata keli nirastra yuddham bandha upabandha patana utthita śūnya hastam

original: dantauṣṭhapīḍananakhakṣataraktasiktaṃ tasyā smarāmi ratibandhuraniṣṭhuratvam // BiCaup_48 //
analyzed: danta oṣṭha pīḍana nakha kṣata rakta siktam tasyāḥ smarāmi rati bandhura niṣṭhura tvam

original: adyāpy ahaṃ varavadhūsuratopabhogaṃ jīvāmi nānyavidhinā kṣaṇam antareṇa /
analyzed: adyā api aham vara vadhū surata upabhogam jīvāmi na anya vidhinā kṣaṇam antareṇa

original: tad bhrātaro maraṇam eva hi duḥkha śāntyai vijñāpayāmi bhavatas tvaritaṃ lunīdhvam // BiCaup_49 //
analyzed: tat bhrātaraḥ maraṇam eva hi duḥkha śāntyai vijñāpayāmi bhavataḥ tvaritam lunīdhvam

original: adyāpi nojjhati haraḥ kila kālakūṭaṃ kūrmo bibharti dharaṇīṃ khalu pṛṣṭabhāge /
analyzed: adyā api nā ujjhati haraḥ kila kālakūṭam kūrmaḥ bibharti dharaṇīm khalu pṛṣṭa bhāge

original: ambhonidhir vahati duḥsahavaḍavāgnim aṅgīkṛtaṃ sukṛtinaḥ paripālayanti // BiCaup_50 //
analyzed: ambhonidhiḥ vahati duḥsaha vaḍavāgnim aṅgīkṛtam su kṛtinaḥ paripālayanti
